00059 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGetConstraintIslandId(const btTypedConstraint* lhs)
00060 {
00061         int islandId;
00062 
00063         const btCollisionObject& rcolObj0 = lhs->getRigidBodyA();
00064         const btCollisionObject& rcolObj1 = lhs->getRigidBodyB();
00065         islandId= rcolObj0.getIslandTag()>=0?rcolObj0.getIslandTag():rcolObj1.getIslandTag();
00066         return islandId;
00067 
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 class btSortConstraintOnIslandPredicate
00072 {
00073         public:
00074 
00075                 bool operator() ( const btTypedConstraint* lhs, const btTypedConstraint* rhs ) const
00076                 {
00077                         int rIslandId0,lIslandId0;
00078                         rIslandId0 = btGetConstraintIslandId(rhs);
00079                         lIslandId0 = btGetConstraintIslandId(lhs);
00080                         return lIslandId0 < rIslandId0;
00081                 }
00082 };

00084 struct InplaceSolverIslandCallback : public btSimulationIslandManager::IslandCallback
00085 {
00086         btContactSolverInfo*    m_solverInfo;
00087         btConstraintSolver*             m_solver;
00088         btTypedConstraint**             m_sortedConstraints;
00089         int                                             m_numConstraints;
00090         btIDebugDraw*                   m_debugDrawer;
00091         btDispatcher*                   m_dispatcher;
00092 
00093         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionObject*> m_bodies;
00094         btAlignedObjectArray<btPersistentManifold*> m_manifolds;
00095         btAlignedObjectArray<btTypedConstraint*> m_constraints;
00096 
00097 
00098         InplaceSolverIslandCallback(
00099                 btConstraintSolver*     solver,
00100                 btStackAlloc* stackAlloc,
00101                 btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00102                 :m_solverInfo(NULL),
00103                 m_solver(solver),
00104                 m_sortedConstraints(NULL),
00105                 m_numConstraints(0),
00106                 m_debugDrawer(NULL),
00107                 m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00108         {
00109 
00110         }
00111 
00112         InplaceSolverIslandCallback& operator=(InplaceSolverIslandCallback& other)
00113         {
00114                 btAssert(0);
00115                 (void)other;
00116                 return *this;
00117         }

00119         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setup ( btContactSolverInfo* solverInfo, btTypedConstraint** sortedConstraints,  int     numConstraints, btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
00120         {
00121                 btAssert(solverInfo);
00122                 m_solverInfo = solverInfo;
00123                 m_sortedConstraints = sortedConstraints;
00124                 m_numConstraints = numConstraints;
00125                 m_debugDrawer = debugDrawer;
00126                 m_bodies.resize (0);
00127                 m_manifolds.resize (0);
00128                 m_constraints.resize (0);
00129         }
00130 
00131 
00132         virtual void    processIsland(btCollisionObject** bodies,int numBodies,btPersistentManifold**   manifolds,int numManifolds, int islandId)
00133         {
00134                 if (islandId<0)
00135                 {
00137                         m_solver->solveGroup( bodies,numBodies,manifolds, numManifolds,&m_sortedConstraints[0],m_numConstraints,*m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00138                 } else
00139                 {
00140                                 //also add all non-contact constraints/joints for this island
00141                         btTypedConstraint** startConstraint = 0;
00142                         int numCurConstraints = 0;
00143                         int i;
00144 
00145                         //find the first constraint for this island
00146                         for (i=0;i<m_numConstraints;i++)
00147                         {
00148                                 if (btGetConstraintIslandId(m_sortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00149                                 {
00150                                         startConstraint = &m_sortedConstraints[i];
00151                                         break;
00152                                 }
00153                         }
00154                         //count the number of constraints in this island
00155                         for (;i<m_numConstraints;i++)
00156                         {
00157                                 if (btGetConstraintIslandId(m_sortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00158                                 {
00159                                         numCurConstraints++;
00160                                 }
00161                         }
00162 
00163                         if (m_solverInfo->m_minimumSolverBatchSize<=1)
00164                         {
00165                                 m_solver->solveGroup( bodies,numBodies,manifolds, numManifolds,startConstraint,numCurConstraints,*m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00166                         } else
00167                         {
00168 
00169                                 for (i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00170                                         m_bodies.push_back(bodies[i]);
00171                                 for (i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
00172                                         m_manifolds.push_back(manifolds[i]);
00173                                 for (i=0;i<numCurConstraints;i++)
00174                                         m_constraints.push_back(startConstraint[i]);
00175                                 if ((m_constraints.size()+m_manifolds.size())>m_solverInfo->m_minimumSolverBatchSize)
00176                                 {
00177                                         processConstraints();
00178                                 } else
00179                                 {
00180                                         //printf("deferred\n");
00181                                 }
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184         }
00185         void    processConstraints()
00186         {
00187 
00188                 btCollisionObject** bodies = m_bodies.size()? &m_bodies[0]:0;
00189                 btPersistentManifold** manifold = m_manifolds.size()?&m_manifolds[0]:0;
00190                 btTypedConstraint** constraints = m_constraints.size()?&m_constraints[0]:0;
00191 
00192                 m_solver->solveGroup( bodies,m_bodies.size(),manifold, m_manifolds.size(),constraints, m_constraints.size() ,*m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00193                 m_bodies.resize(0);
00194                 m_manifolds.resize(0);
00195                 m_constraints.resize(0);
00196 
00197         }
00198 
00199 };

00203 btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::btDiscreteDynamicsWorld(btDispatcher* dispatcher,btBroadphaseInterface* pairCache,btConstraintSolver* constraintSolver, btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration)
00204 :btDynamicsWorld(dispatcher,pairCache,collisionConfiguration),
00205 m_sortedConstraints     (),
00206 m_solverIslandCallback ( NULL ),
00207 m_constraintSolver(constraintSolver),
00208 m_gravity(0,-10,0),
00209 m_localTime(0),
00210 m_fixedTimeStep(0),
00211 m_synchronizeAllMotionStates(false),
00212 m_applySpeculativeContactRestitution(false),
00213 m_profileTimings(0),
00214 m_latencyMotionStateInterpolation(true)
00215 
00216 {
00217         if (!m_constraintSolver)
00218         {
00219                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver),16);
00220                 m_constraintSolver = new (mem) btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver;
00221                 m_ownsConstraintSolver = true;
00222         } else
00223         {
00224                 m_ownsConstraintSolver = false;
00225         }
00226 
00227         {
00228                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSimulationIslandManager),16);
00229                 m_islandManager = new (mem) btSimulationIslandManager();
00230         }
00231 
00232         m_ownsIslandManager = true;
00233 
00234         {
00235                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(InplaceSolverIslandCallback),16);
00236                 m_solverIslandCallback = new (mem) InplaceSolverIslandCallback (m_constraintSolver, 0, dispatcher);
00237         }
00238 }

00241 btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::~btDiscreteDynamicsWorld()
00242 {
00243         //only delete it when we created it
00244         if (m_ownsIslandManager)
00245         {
00246                 m_islandManager->~btSimulationIslandManager();
00247                 btAlignedFree( m_islandManager);
00248         }
00249         if (m_solverIslandCallback)
00250         {
00251                 m_solverIslandCallback->~InplaceSolverIslandCallback();
00252                 btAlignedFree(m_solverIslandCallback);
00253         }
00254         if (m_ownsConstraintSolver)
00255         {
00256 
00257                 m_constraintSolver->~btConstraintSolver();
00258                 btAlignedFree(m_constraintSolver);
00259         }
00260 }

00262 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::saveKinematicState(btScalar timeStep)
00263 {
00267         for (int i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
00268         {
00269                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
00270                 btRigidBody* body = btRigidBody::upcast(colObj);
00271                 if (body && body->getActivationState() != ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00272                 {
00273                         if (body->isKinematicObject())
00274                         {
00275                                 //to calculate velocities next frame
00276                                 body->saveKinematicState(timeStep);
00277                         }
00278                 }
00279         }
00280 
00281 }

00283 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::debugDrawWorld()
00284 {
00285         BT_PROFILE("debugDrawWorld");
00286 
00287         btCollisionWorld::debugDrawWorld();
00288 
00289         bool drawConstraints = false;
00290         if (getDebugDrawer())
00291         {
00292                 int mode = getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode();
00293                 if(mode  & (btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraints | btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraintLimits))
00294                 {
00295                         drawConstraints = true;
00296                 }
00297         }
00298         if(drawConstraints)
00299         {
00300                 for(int i = getNumConstraints()-1; i>=0 ;i--)
00301                 {
00302                         btTypedConstraint* constraint = getConstraint(i);
00303                         debugDrawConstraint(constraint);
00304                 }
00305         }
00306 
00307 
00308 
00309     if (getDebugDrawer() && (getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & (btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawWireframe | btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawAabb | btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawNormals)))
00310         {
00311                 int i;
00312 
00313                 if (getDebugDrawer() && getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode())
00314                 {
00315                         for (i=0;i<m_actions.size();i++)
00316                         {
00317                                 m_actions[i]->debugDraw(m_debugDrawer);
00318                         }
00319                 }
00320         }
00321     if (getDebugDrawer())
00322         getDebugDrawer()->flushLines();
00323 
00324 }

00326 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::clearForces()
00327 {
00329         for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
00330         {
00331                 btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
00332                 //need to check if next line is ok
00333                 //it might break backward compatibility (people applying forces on sleeping objects get never cleared and accumulate on wake-up
00334                 body->clearForces();
00335         }
00336 }

00339 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::applyGravity()
00340 {
00342         for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
00343         {
00344                 btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
00345                 if (body->isActive())
00346                 {
00347                         body->applyGravity();
00348                 }
00349         }
00350 }

00353 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::synchronizeSingleMotionState(btRigidBody* body)
00354 {
00355         btAssert(body);
00356 
00357         if (body->getMotionState() && !body->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00358         {
00359                 //we need to call the update at least once, even for sleeping objects
00360                 //otherwise the 'graphics' transform never updates properly
00362                 //if (body->getActivationState() != ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00363                 {
00364                         btTransform interpolatedTransform;
00365                         btTransformUtil::integrateTransform(body->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),
00366                                 body->getInterpolationLinearVelocity(),body->getInterpolationAngularVelocity(),
00367                                 (m_latencyMotionStateInterpolation && m_fixedTimeStep) ? m_localTime - m_fixedTimeStep : m_localTime*body->getHitFraction(),
00368                                 interpolatedTransform);
00369                         body->getMotionState()->setWorldTransform(interpolatedTransform);
00370                 }
00371         }
00372 }
00373 
00374 
00375 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::synchronizeMotionStates()
00376 {
00377 //      BT_PROFILE("synchronizeMotionStates");
00378         if (m_synchronizeAllMotionStates)
00379         {
00380                 //iterate  over all collision objects
00381                 for ( int i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
00382                 {
00383                         btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
00384                         btRigidBody* body = btRigidBody::upcast(colObj);
00385                         if (body)
00386                                 synchronizeSingleMotionState(body);
00387                 }
00388         } else
00389         {
00390                 //iterate over all active rigid bodies
00391                 for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
00392                 {
00393                         btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
00394                         if (body->isActive())
00395                                 synchronizeSingleMotionState(body);
00396                 }
00397         }
00398 }

00400 
00401 int     btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::stepSimulation( btScalar timeStep,int maxSubSteps, btScalar fixedTimeStep)
00402 {
00403         startProfiling(timeStep);
00404 
00405 
00406         int numSimulationSubSteps = 0;
00407 
00408         if (maxSubSteps)
00409         {
00410                 //fixed timestep with interpolation
00411                 m_fixedTimeStep = fixedTimeStep;
00412                 m_localTime += timeStep;
00413                 if (m_localTime >= fixedTimeStep)
00414                 {
00415                         numSimulationSubSteps = int( m_localTime / fixedTimeStep);
00416                         m_localTime -= numSimulationSubSteps * fixedTimeStep;
00417                 }
00418         } else
00419         {
00420                 //variable timestep
00421                 fixedTimeStep = timeStep;
00422                 m_localTime = m_latencyMotionStateInterpolation ? 0 : timeStep;
00423                 m_fixedTimeStep = 0;
00424                 if (btFuzzyZero(timeStep))
00425                 {
00426                         numSimulationSubSteps = 0;
00427                         maxSubSteps = 0;
00428                 } else
00429                 {
00430                         numSimulationSubSteps = 1;
00431                         maxSubSteps = 1;
00432                 }
00433         }
00434 
00435         //process some debugging flags
00436         if (getDebugDrawer())
00437         {
00438                 btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer = getDebugDrawer ();
00439                 gDisableDeactivation = (debugDrawer->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_NoDeactivation) != 0;
00440         }
00441         if (numSimulationSubSteps)
00442         {
00443 
00444                 //clamp the number of substeps, to prevent simulation grinding spiralling down to a halt
00445                 int clampedSimulationSteps = (numSimulationSubSteps > maxSubSteps)? maxSubSteps : numSimulationSubSteps;
00446 
00447                 saveKinematicState(fixedTimeStep*clampedSimulationSteps);
00448 
00449                 applyGravity();
00450 
00451 
00452 
00453                 for (int i=0;i<clampedSimulationSteps;i++)
00454                 {
00455                         internalSingleStepSimulation(fixedTimeStep);
00456                         synchronizeMotionStates();
00457                 }
00458 
00459         } else
00460         {
00461                 synchronizeMotionStates();
00462         }
00463 
00464         clearForces();
00465 
00466 #ifndef BT_NO_PROFILE
00467         CProfileManager::Increment_Frame_Counter();
00468 #endif //BT_NO_PROFILE
00469 
00470         return numSimulationSubSteps;
00471 }
00472 
00473 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::internalSingleStepSimulation(btScalar timeStep)
00474 {
00475 
00476         BT_PROFILE("internalSingleStepSimulation");
00477 
00478         if(0 != m_internalPreTickCallback) {
00479                 (*m_internalPreTickCallback)(this, timeStep);
00480         }
00481 
00483         predictUnconstraintMotion(timeStep);
00484 
00485         btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo = getDispatchInfo();
00486 
00487         dispatchInfo.m_timeStep = timeStep;
00488         dispatchInfo.m_stepCount = 0;
00489         dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw = getDebugDrawer();
00490 
00491 
00492     createPredictiveContacts(timeStep);
00493 
00495         performDiscreteCollisionDetection();
00496 
00497         calculateSimulationIslands();
00498 
00499 
00500         getSolverInfo().m_timeStep = timeStep;
00501 
00502 
00503 
00505         solveConstraints(getSolverInfo());
00506 
00508 
00510 
00511         integrateTransforms(timeStep);
00512 
00514         updateActions(timeStep);
00515 
00516         updateActivationState( timeStep );
00517 
00518         if(0 != m_internalTickCallback) {
00519                 (*m_internalTickCallback)(this, timeStep);
00520         }
00521 }
00522 
00523 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::setGravity(const btVector3& gravity)
00524 {
00525         m_gravity = gravity;
00526         for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
00527         {
00528                 btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
00529                 if (body->isActive() && !(body->getFlags() &BT_DISABLE_WORLD_GRAVITY))
00530                 {
00531                         body->setGravity(gravity);
00532                 }
00533         }
00534 }
00535 
00536 btVector3 btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::getGravity () const
00537 {
00538         return m_gravity;
00539 }

00555 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::removeRigidBody(btRigidBody* body)

00558         btCollisionWorld::removeCollisionObject(body);

00560 
00561 
00562 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::addRigidBody(btRigidBody* body)
00563 {
00564         if (!body->isStaticOrKinematicObject() && !(body->getFlags() &BT_DISABLE_WORLD_GRAVITY))
00565         {
00566                 body->setGravity(m_gravity);
00567         }
00568 
00569         if (body->getCollisionShape())
00570         {
00571                 if (!body->isStaticObject())
00572                 {
00573                         m_nonStaticRigidBodies.push_back(body);
00574                 } else
00575                 {
00576                         body->setActivationState(ISLAND_SLEEPING);
00577                 }
00578 
00579                 bool isDynamic = !(body->isStaticObject() || body->isKinematicObject());
00580                 int collisionFilterGroup = isDynamic? int(btBroadphaseProxy::DefaultFilter) : int(btBroadphaseProxy::StaticFilter);
00581                 int collisionFilterMask = isDynamic?    int(btBroadphaseProxy::AllFilter) :     int(btBroadphaseProxy::AllFilter ^ btBroadphaseProxy::StaticFilter);
00582 
00583                 addCollisionObject(body,collisionFilterGroup,collisionFilterMask);
00584         }
00585 }
00586 
00587 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::addRigidBody(btRigidBody* body, int group, int mask)
00588 {
00589         if (!body->isStaticOrKinematicObject() && !(body->getFlags() &BT_DISABLE_WORLD_GRAVITY))
00590         {
00591                 body->setGravity(m_gravity);
00592         }
00593 
00594         if (body->getCollisionShape())
00595         {
00596                 if (!body->isStaticObject())
00597                 {
00598                         m_nonStaticRigidBodies.push_back(body);
00599                 }
00600                  else
00601                 {
00602                         body->setActivationState(ISLAND_SLEEPING);
00603                 }
00604                 addCollisionObject(body,group,mask);
00605         }
00606 }

00620 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::updateActivationState(btScalar timeStep)
00621 {
00622         BT_PROFILE("updateActivationState");
00623 
00624         for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
00625         {
00626                 btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
00627                 if (body)
00628                 {
00629                         body->updateDeactivation(timeStep);
00630 
00631                         if (body->wantsSleeping())
00632                         {
00633                                 if (body->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00634                                 {
00635                                         body->setActivationState(ISLAND_SLEEPING);
00636                                 } else
00637                                 {
00638                                         if (body->getActivationState() == ACTIVE_TAG)
00639                                                 body->setActivationState( WANTS_DEACTIVATION );
00640                                         if (body->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00641                                         {
00642                                                 body->setAngularVelocity(btVector3(0,0,0));
00643                                                 body->setLinearVelocity(btVector3(0,0,0));
00644                                         }
00645 
00646                                 }
00647                         } else
00648                         {
00649                                 if (body->getActivationState() != DISABLE_DEACTIVATION)
00650                                         body->setActivationState( ACTIVE_TAG );
00651                         }
00652                 }
00653         }
00654 }
00655 
00656 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::addConstraint(btTypedConstraint* constraint,bool disableCollisionsBetweenLinkedBodies)
00657 {
00658         m_constraints.push_back(constraint);
00659     //Make sure the two bodies of a type constraint are different (possibly add this to the btTypedConstraint constructor?)
00660     btAssert(&constraint->getRigidBodyA()!=&constraint->getRigidBodyB());
00661     
00662         if (disableCollisionsBetweenLinkedBodies)
00663         {
00664                 constraint->getRigidBodyA().addConstraintRef(constraint);
00665                 constraint->getRigidBodyB().addConstraintRef(constraint);
00666         }
00667 }
00668 
00669 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::removeConstraint(btTypedConstraint* constraint)
00670 {
00671         m_constraints.remove(constraint);
00672         constraint->getRigidBodyA().removeConstraintRef(constraint);
00673         constraint->getRigidBodyB().removeConstraintRef(constraint);
00674 }
00675

00677 {
00678         m_actions.push_back(action);
00679 }
00680 
00681 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::removeAction(btActionInterface* action)
00682 {
00683         m_actions.remove(action);
00684 }

00708 
00709 
00710 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::solveConstraints(btContactSolverInfo& solverInfo)
00711 {
00712         BT_PROFILE("solveConstraints");
00713 
00714         m_sortedConstraints.resize( m_constraints.size());
00715         int i;
00716         for (i=0;i<getNumConstraints();i++)
00717         {
00718                 m_sortedConstraints[i] = m_constraints[i];
00719         }
00720 
00721 //      btAssert(0);
00722 
00723 
00724 
00725         m_sortedConstraints.quickSort(btSortConstraintOnIslandPredicate());
00726 
00727         btTypedConstraint** constraintsPtr = getNumConstraints() ? &m_sortedConstraints[0] : 0;
00728 
00729         m_solverIslandCallback->setup(&solverInfo,constraintsPtr,m_sortedConstraints.size(),getDebugDrawer());
00730         m_constraintSolver->prepareSolve(getCollisionWorld()->getNumCollisionObjects(), getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher()->getNumManifolds());
00731 
00733         m_islandManager->buildAndProcessIslands(getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher(),getCollisionWorld(),m_solverIslandCallback);
00734 
00735         m_solverIslandCallback->processConstraints();
00736 
00737         m_constraintSolver->allSolved(solverInfo, m_debugDrawer);
00738 }
00739 
00740 
00741 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::calculateSimulationIslands()
00742 {
00743         BT_PROFILE("calculateSimulationIslands");
00744 
00745         getSimulationIslandManager()->updateActivationState(getCollisionWorld(),getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher());
00746 
00747     {
00748         //merge islands based on speculative contact manifolds too
00749         for (int i=0;i<this->m_predictiveManifolds.size();i++)
00750         {
00751             btPersistentManifold* manifold = m_predictiveManifolds[i];
00752 
00753             const btCollisionObject* colObj0 = manifold->getBody0();
00754             const btCollisionObject* colObj1 = manifold->getBody1();
00755 
00756             if (((colObj0) && (!(colObj0)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())) &&
00757                 ((colObj1) && (!(colObj1)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())))
00758             {
00759                                 getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite((colObj0)->getIslandTag(),(colObj1)->getIslandTag());
00760             }
00761         }
00762     }
00763 
00764         {
00765                 int i;
00766                 int numConstraints = int(m_constraints.size());
00767                 for (i=0;i< numConstraints ; i++ )
00768                 {
00769                         btTypedConstraint* constraint = m_constraints[i];
00770                         if (constraint->isEnabled())
00771                         {
00772                                 const btRigidBody* colObj0 = &constraint->getRigidBodyA();
00773                                 const btRigidBody* colObj1 = &constraint->getRigidBodyB();
00774 
00775                                 if (((colObj0) && (!(colObj0)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())) &&
00776                                         ((colObj1) && (!(colObj1)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())))
00777                                 {
00778                                         getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite((colObj0)->getIslandTag(),(colObj1)->getIslandTag());
00779                                 }
00780                         }
00781                 }
00782         }
00783 
00784         //Store the island id in each body
00785         getSimulationIslandManager()->storeIslandActivationState(getCollisionWorld());
00786 
00787 
00788 }
00789 
00790 
00791 
00792 
00793 class btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback : public btCollisionWorld::ClosestConvexResultCallback
00794 {
00795 public:
00796 
00797         btCollisionObject* m_me;
00798         btScalar m_allowedPenetration;
00799         btOverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00800         btDispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00801 
00802 public:
00803         btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback (btCollisionObject* me,const btVector3& fromA,const btVector3& toA,btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,btDispatcher* dispatcher) :
00804           btCollisionWorld::ClosestConvexResultCallback(fromA,toA),
00805                 m_me(me),
00806                 m_allowedPenetration(0.0f),
00807                 m_pairCache(pairCache),
00808                 m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00809         {
00810         }
00811 
00812         virtual btScalar addSingleResult(btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult& convexResult,bool normalInWorldSpace)
00813         {
00814                 if (convexResult.m_hitCollisionObject == m_me)
00815                         return 1.0f;
00816 
00817                 //ignore result if there is no contact response
00818                 if(!convexResult.m_hitCollisionObject->hasContactResponse())
00819                         return 1.0f;
00820 
00821                 btVector3 linVelA,linVelB;
00822                 linVelA = m_convexToWorld-m_convexFromWorld;
00823                 linVelB = btVector3(0,0,0);//toB.getOrigin()-fromB.getOrigin();
00824 
00825                 btVector3 relativeVelocity = (linVelA-linVelB);
00826                 //don't report time of impact for motion away from the contact normal (or causes minor penetration)
00827                 if (convexResult.m_hitNormalLocal.dot(relativeVelocity)>=-m_allowedPenetration)
00828                         return 1.f;
00829 
00830                 return ClosestConvexResultCallback::addSingleResult (convexResult, normalInWorldSpace);
00831         }
00832 
00833         virtual bool needsCollision(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0) const
00834         {
00835                 //don't collide with itself
00836                 if (proxy0->m_clientObject == m_me)
00837                         return false;
00838 
00840                 if (!ClosestConvexResultCallback::needsCollision(proxy0))
00841                         return false;
00842 
00843                 btCollisionObject* otherObj = (btCollisionObject*) proxy0->m_clientObject;
00844 
00845                 //call needsResponse, see http://code.google.com/p/bullet/issues/detail?id=179
00846                 if (m_dispatcher->needsResponse(m_me,otherObj))
00847                 {
00848 #if 0
00850                         btAlignedObjectArray<btPersistentManifold*> manifoldArray;
00851                         btBroadphasePair* collisionPair = m_pairCache->findPair(m_me->getBroadphaseHandle(),proxy0);
00852                         if (collisionPair)
00853                         {
00854                                 if (collisionPair->m_algorithm)
00855                                 {
00856                                         manifoldArray.resize(0);
00857                                         collisionPair->m_algorithm->getAllContactManifolds(manifoldArray);
00858                                         for (int j=0;j<manifoldArray.size();j++)
00859                                         {
00860                                                 btPersistentManifold* manifold = manifoldArray[j];
00861                                                 if (manifold->getNumContacts()>0)
00862                                                         return false;
00863                                         }
00864                                 }
00865                         }
00866 #endif
00867                         return true;
00868                 }
00869 
00870                 return false;
00871         }
00872 
00873 
00874 };
00875 
00877 int gNumClampedCcdMotions=0;
00878 
00879 
00880 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::createPredictiveContactsInternal( btRigidBody** bodies, int numBodies, btScalar timeStep)
00881 {
00882         btTransform predictedTrans;
00883         for ( int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00884         {
00885                 btRigidBody* body = bodies[i];
00886                 body->setHitFraction(1.f);
00887 
00888                 if (body->isActive() && (!body->isStaticOrKinematicObject()))
00889                 {
00890 
00891                         body->predictIntegratedTransform(timeStep, predictedTrans);
00892 
00893                         btScalar squareMotion = (predictedTrans.getOrigin()-body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
00894 
00895                         if (getDispatchInfo().m_useContinuous && body->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold() && body->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold() < squareMotion)
00896                         {
00897                                 BT_PROFILE("predictive convexSweepTest");
00898                                 if (body->getCollisionShape()->isConvex())
00899                                 {
00900                                         gNumClampedCcdMotions++;
00901 #ifdef PREDICTIVE_CONTACT_USE_STATIC_ONLY
00902                                         class StaticOnlyCallback : public btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback
00903                                         {
00904                                         public:
00905 
00906                                                 StaticOnlyCallback (btCollisionObject* me,const btVector3& fromA,const btVector3& toA,btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,btDispatcher* dispatcher) :
00907                                                   btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback(me,fromA,toA,pairCache,dispatcher)
00908                                                 {
00909                                                 }
00910 
00911                                                 virtual bool needsCollision(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0) const
00912                                                 {
00913                                                         btCollisionObject* otherObj = (btCollisionObject*) proxy0->m_clientObject;
00914                                                         if (!otherObj->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00915                                                                 return false;
00916                                                         return btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback::needsCollision(proxy0);
00917                                                 }
00918                                         };
00919 
00920                                         StaticOnlyCallback sweepResults(body,body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(),predictedTrans.getOrigin(),getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache(),getDispatcher());
00921 #else
00922                                         btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback sweepResults(body,body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(),predictedTrans.getOrigin(),getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache(),getDispatcher());
00923 #endif
00924                                         //btConvexShape* convexShape = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(body->getCollisionShape());
00925                                         btSphereShape tmpSphere(body->getCcdSweptSphereRadius());//btConvexShape* convexShape = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(body->getCollisionShape());
00926                                         sweepResults.m_allowedPenetration=getDispatchInfo().m_allowedCcdPenetration;
00927 
00928                                         sweepResults.m_collisionFilterGroup = body->getBroadphaseProxy()->m_collisionFilterGroup;
00929                                         sweepResults.m_collisionFilterMask  = body->getBroadphaseProxy()->m_collisionFilterMask;
00930                                         btTransform modifiedPredictedTrans = predictedTrans;
00931                                         modifiedPredictedTrans.setBasis(body->getWorldTransform().getBasis());
00932 
00933                                         convexSweepTest(&tmpSphere,body->getWorldTransform(),modifiedPredictedTrans,sweepResults);
00934                                         if (sweepResults.hasHit() && (sweepResults.m_closestHitFraction < 1.f))
00935                                         {
00936 
00937                                                 btVector3 distVec = (predictedTrans.getOrigin()-body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin())*sweepResults.m_closestHitFraction;
00938                                                 btScalar distance = distVec.dot(-sweepResults.m_hitNormalWorld);
00939 
00940 
00941                                                 btPersistentManifold* manifold = m_dispatcher1->getNewManifold(body,sweepResults.m_hitCollisionObject);
00942                         btMutexLock( &m_predictiveManifoldsMutex );
00943                                                 m_predictiveManifolds.push_back(manifold);
00944                         btMutexUnlock( &m_predictiveManifoldsMutex );
00945 
00946                                                 btVector3 worldPointB = body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()+distVec;
00947                                                 btVector3 localPointB = sweepResults.m_hitCollisionObject->getWorldTransform().inverse()*worldPointB;
00948 
00949                                                 btManifoldPoint newPoint(btVector3(0,0,0), localPointB,sweepResults.m_hitNormalWorld,distance);
00950 
00951                                                 bool isPredictive = true;
00952                                                 int index = manifold->addManifoldPoint(newPoint, isPredictive);
00953                                                 btManifoldPoint& pt = manifold->getContactPoint(index);
00954                                                 pt.m_combinedRestitution = 0;
00955                                                 pt.m_combinedFriction = btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedFriction(body,sweepResults.m_hitCollisionObject);
00956                                                 pt.m_positionWorldOnA = body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00957                                                 pt.m_positionWorldOnB = worldPointB;
00958 
00959                                         }
00960                                 }
00961                         }
00962                 }
00963         }
00964 }
00965 
00966 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::releasePredictiveContacts()
00967 {
00968     BT_PROFILE( "release predictive contact manifolds" );
00969 
00970     for ( int i = 0; i < m_predictiveManifolds.size(); i++ )
00971     {
00972         btPersistentManifold* manifold = m_predictiveManifolds[ i ];
00973         this->m_dispatcher1->releaseManifold( manifold );
00974     }
00975     m_predictiveManifolds.clear();
00976 }
00977 
00978 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::createPredictiveContacts(btScalar timeStep)
00979 {
00980         BT_PROFILE("createPredictiveContacts");
00981     releasePredictiveContacts();
00982     if (m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size() > 0)
00983     {
00984         createPredictiveContactsInternal( &m_nonStaticRigidBodies[ 0 ], m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size(), timeStep );
00985     }
00986 }
00987 
00988 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::integrateTransformsInternal( btRigidBody** bodies, int numBodies, btScalar timeStep )
00989 {
00990         btTransform predictedTrans;
00991         for (int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00992         {
00993                 btRigidBody* body = bodies[i];
00994                 body->setHitFraction(1.f);
00995 
00996                 if (body->isActive() && (!body->isStaticOrKinematicObject()))
00997                 {
00998 
00999                         body->predictIntegratedTransform(timeStep, predictedTrans);
01000 
01001                         btScalar squareMotion = (predictedTrans.getOrigin()-body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
01002 
01003 
01004 
01005                         if (getDispatchInfo().m_useContinuous && body->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold() && body->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold() < squareMotion)
01006                         {
01007                                 BT_PROFILE("CCD motion clamping");
01008                                 if (body->getCollisionShape()->isConvex())
01009                                 {
01010                                         gNumClampedCcdMotions++;
01011 #ifdef USE_STATIC_ONLY
01012                                         class StaticOnlyCallback : public btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback
01013                                         {
01014                                         public:
01015 
01016                                                 StaticOnlyCallback (btCollisionObject* me,const btVector3& fromA,const btVector3& toA,btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,btDispatcher* dispatcher) :
01017                                                   btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback(me,fromA,toA,pairCache,dispatcher)
01018                                                 {
01019                                                 }
01020 
01021                                                 virtual bool needsCollision(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0) const
01022                                                 {
01023                                                         btCollisionObject* otherObj = (btCollisionObject*) proxy0->m_clientObject;
01024                                                         if (!otherObj->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01025                                                                 return false;
01026                                                         return btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback::needsCollision(proxy0);
01027                                                 }
01028                                         };
01029 
01030                                         StaticOnlyCallback sweepResults(body,body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(),predictedTrans.getOrigin(),getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache(),getDispatcher());
01031 #else
01032                                         btClosestNotMeConvexResultCallback sweepResults(body,body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(),predictedTrans.getOrigin(),getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache(),getDispatcher());
01033 #endif
01034                                         //btConvexShape* convexShape = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(body->getCollisionShape());
01035                                         btSphereShape tmpSphere(body->getCcdSweptSphereRadius());//btConvexShape* convexShape = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(body->getCollisionShape());
01036                                         sweepResults.m_allowedPenetration=getDispatchInfo().m_allowedCcdPenetration;
01037 
01038                                         sweepResults.m_collisionFilterGroup = body->getBroadphaseProxy()->m_collisionFilterGroup;
01039                                         sweepResults.m_collisionFilterMask  = body->getBroadphaseProxy()->m_collisionFilterMask;
01040                                         btTransform modifiedPredictedTrans = predictedTrans;
01041                                         modifiedPredictedTrans.setBasis(body->getWorldTransform().getBasis());
01042 
01043                                         convexSweepTest(&tmpSphere,body->getWorldTransform(),modifiedPredictedTrans,sweepResults);
01044                                         if (sweepResults.hasHit() && (sweepResults.m_closestHitFraction < 1.f))
01045                                         {
01046 
01047                                                 //printf("clamped integration to hit fraction = %f\n",fraction);
01048                                                 body->setHitFraction(sweepResults.m_closestHitFraction);
01049                                                 body->predictIntegratedTransform(timeStep*body->getHitFraction(), predictedTrans);
01050                                                 body->setHitFraction(0.f);
01051                                                 body->proceedToTransform( predictedTrans);
01052 
01053 #if 0
01054                                                 btVector3 linVel = body->getLinearVelocity();
01055 
01056                                                 btScalar maxSpeed = body->getCcdMotionThreshold()/getSolverInfo().m_timeStep;
01057                                                 btScalar maxSpeedSqr = maxSpeed*maxSpeed;
01058                                                 if (linVel.length2()>maxSpeedSqr)
01059                                                 {
01060                                                         linVel.normalize();
01061                                                         linVel*= maxSpeed;
01062                                                         body->setLinearVelocity(linVel);
01063                                                         btScalar ms2 = body->getLinearVelocity().length2();
01064                                                         body->predictIntegratedTransform(timeStep, predictedTrans);
01065 
01066                                                         btScalar sm2 = (predictedTrans.getOrigin()-body->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
01067                                                         btScalar smt = body->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold();
01068                                                         printf("sm2=%f\n",sm2);
01069                                                 }
01070 #else
01071 
01072                                                 //don't apply the collision response right now, it will happen next frame
01073                                                 //if you really need to, you can uncomment next 3 lines. Note that is uses zero restitution.
01074                                                 //btScalar appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01075                                                 //btScalar depth = 0.f;
01076                                                 //appliedImpulse = resolveSingleCollision(body,(btCollisionObject*)sweepResults.m_hitCollisionObject,sweepResults.m_hitPointWorld,sweepResults.m_hitNormalWorld,getSolverInfo(), depth);
01077 
01078 
01079 #endif
01080 
01081                                         continue;
01082                                         }
01083                                 }
01084                         }
01085 
01086 
01087                         body->proceedToTransform( predictedTrans);
01088 
01089                 }
01090 
01091         }
01092 
01093 }
01094 
01095 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::integrateTransforms(btScalar timeStep)
01096 {
01097         BT_PROFILE("integrateTransforms");
01098     if (m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size() > 0)
01099     {
01100         integrateTransformsInternal(&m_nonStaticRigidBodies[0], m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size(), timeStep);
01101     }
01102 
01104         if (m_applySpeculativeContactRestitution)
01105         {
01106                 BT_PROFILE("apply speculative contact restitution");
01107                 for (int i=0;i<m_predictiveManifolds.size();i++)
01108                 {
01109                         btPersistentManifold* manifold = m_predictiveManifolds[i];
01110                         btRigidBody* body0 = btRigidBody::upcast((btCollisionObject*)manifold->getBody0());
01111                         btRigidBody* body1 = btRigidBody::upcast((btCollisionObject*)manifold->getBody1());
01112 
01113                         for (int p=0;p<manifold->getNumContacts();p++)
01114                         {
01115                                 const btManifoldPoint& pt = manifold->getContactPoint(p);
01116                                 btScalar combinedRestitution = btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedRestitution(body0, body1);
01117 
01118                                 if (combinedRestitution>0 && pt.m_appliedImpulse != 0.f)
01119                                 //if (pt.getDistance()>0 && combinedRestitution>0 && pt.m_appliedImpulse != 0.f)
01120                                 {
01121                                         btVector3 imp = -pt.m_normalWorldOnB * pt.m_appliedImpulse* combinedRestitution;
01122 
01123                                         const btVector3& pos1 = pt.getPositionWorldOnA();
01124                                         const btVector3& pos2 = pt.getPositionWorldOnB();
01125 
01126                                         btVector3 rel_pos0 = pos1 - body0->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
01127                                         btVector3 rel_pos1 = pos2 - body1->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
01128 
01129                                         if (body0)
01130                                                 body0->applyImpulse(imp,rel_pos0);
01131                                         if (body1)
01132                                                 body1->applyImpulse(-imp,rel_pos1);
01133                                 }
01134                         }
01135                 }
01136         }
01137 }
01138 
01139 
01140 
01141 
01142 
01143 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::predictUnconstraintMotion(btScalar timeStep)
01144 {
01145         BT_PROFILE("predictUnconstraintMotion");
01146         for ( int i=0;i<m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size();i++)
01147         {
01148                 btRigidBody* body = m_nonStaticRigidBodies[i];
01149                 if (!body->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01150                 {
01151                         //don't integrate/update velocities here, it happens in the constraint solver
01152 
01153                         body->applyDamping(timeStep);
01154 
01155                         body->predictIntegratedTransform(timeStep,body->getInterpolationWorldTransform());
01156                 }
01157         }
01158 }
01159

01161 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::startProfiling(btScalar timeStep)
01162 {
01163         (void)timeStep;
01164 
01165 #ifndef BT_NO_PROFILE
01166         CProfileManager::Reset();
01167 #endif //BT_NO_PROFILE
01168 
01169 }

01174 
01175 
01176 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::debugDrawConstraint(btTypedConstraint* constraint)
01177 {
01178         bool drawFrames = (getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraints) != 0;
01179         bool drawLimits = (getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraintLimits) != 0;
01180         btScalar dbgDrawSize = constraint->getDbgDrawSize();
01181         if(dbgDrawSize <= btScalar(0.f))
01182         {
01183                 return;
01184         }
01185 
01186         switch(constraint->getConstraintType())
01187         {
01188                 case POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01189                         {
01190                                 btPoint2PointConstraint* p2pC = (btPoint2PointConstraint*)constraint;
01191                                 btTransform tr;
01192                                 tr.setIdentity();
01193                                 btVector3 pivot = p2pC->getPivotInA();
01194                                 pivot = p2pC->getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pivot;
01195                                 tr.setOrigin(pivot);
01196                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01197                                 // that ideally should draw the same frame
01198                                 pivot = p2pC->getPivotInB();
01199                                 pivot = p2pC->getRigidBodyB().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pivot;
01200                                 tr.setOrigin(pivot);
01201                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01202                         }
01203                         break;
01204                 case HINGE_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01205                         {
01206                                 btHingeConstraint* pHinge = (btHingeConstraint*)constraint;
01207                                 btTransform tr = pHinge->getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pHinge->getAFrame();
01208                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01209                                 tr = pHinge->getRigidBodyB().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pHinge->getBFrame();
01210                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01211                                 btScalar minAng = pHinge->getLowerLimit();
01212                                 btScalar maxAng = pHinge->getUpperLimit();
01213                                 if(minAng == maxAng)
01214                                 {
01215                                         break;
01216                                 }
01217                                 bool drawSect = true;
01218                                 if(!pHinge->hasLimit())
01219                                 {
01220                                         minAng = btScalar(0.f);
01221                                         maxAng = SIMD_2_PI;
01222                                         drawSect = false;
01223                                 }
01224                                 if(drawLimits)
01225                                 {
01226                                         btVector3& center = tr.getOrigin();
01227                                         btVector3 normal = tr.getBasis().getColumn(2);
01228                                         btVector3 axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01229                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, axis, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, minAng, maxAng, btVector3(0,0,0), drawSect);
01230                                 }
01231                         }
01232                         break;
01233                 case CONETWIST_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01234                         {
01235                                 btConeTwistConstraint* pCT = (btConeTwistConstraint*)constraint;
01236                                 btTransform tr = pCT->getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pCT->getAFrame();
01237                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01238                                 tr = pCT->getRigidBodyB().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pCT->getBFrame();
01239                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01240                                 if(drawLimits)
01241                                 {
01242                                         //const btScalar length = btScalar(5);
01243                                         const btScalar length = dbgDrawSize;
01244                                         static int nSegments = 8*4;
01245                                         btScalar fAngleInRadians = btScalar(2.*3.1415926) * (btScalar)(nSegments-1)/btScalar(nSegments);
01246                                         btVector3 pPrev = pCT->GetPointForAngle(fAngleInRadians, length);
01247                                         pPrev = tr * pPrev;
01248                                         for (int i=0; i<nSegments; i++)
01249                                         {
01250                                                 fAngleInRadians = btScalar(2.*3.1415926) * (btScalar)i/btScalar(nSegments);
01251                                                 btVector3 pCur = pCT->GetPointForAngle(fAngleInRadians, length);
01252                                                 pCur = tr * pCur;
01253                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(pPrev, pCur, btVector3(0,0,0));
01254 
01255                                                 if (i%(nSegments/8) == 0)
01256                                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(tr.getOrigin(), pCur, btVector3(0,0,0));
01257 
01258                                                 pPrev = pCur;
01259                                         }
01260                                         btScalar tws = pCT->getTwistSpan();
01261                                         btScalar twa = pCT->getTwistAngle();
01262                                         bool useFrameB = (pCT->getRigidBodyB().getInvMass() > btScalar(0.f));
01263                                         if(useFrameB)
01264                                         {
01265                                                 tr = pCT->getRigidBodyB().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pCT->getBFrame();
01266                                         }
01267                                         else
01268                                         {
01269                                                 tr = pCT->getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform() * pCT->getAFrame();
01270                                         }
01271                                         btVector3 pivot = tr.getOrigin();
01272                                         btVector3 normal = tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01273                                         btVector3 axis1 = tr.getBasis().getColumn(1);
01274                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(pivot, normal, axis1, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, -twa-tws, -twa+tws, btVector3(0,0,0), true);
01275 
01276                                 }
01277                         }
01278                         break;
01279                 case D6_SPRING_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01280                 case D6_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01281                         {
01282                                 btGeneric6DofConstraint* p6DOF = (btGeneric6DofConstraint*)constraint;
01283                                 btTransform tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01284                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01285                                 tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB();
01286                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01287                                 if(drawLimits)
01288                                 {
01289                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01290                                         const btVector3& center = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB().getOrigin();
01291                                         btVector3 up = tr.getBasis().getColumn(2);
01292                                         btVector3 axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01293                                         btScalar minTh = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(1)->m_loLimit;
01294                                         btScalar maxTh = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(1)->m_hiLimit;
01295                                         btScalar minPs = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(2)->m_loLimit;
01296                                         btScalar maxPs = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(2)->m_hiLimit;
01297                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawSpherePatch(center, up, axis, dbgDrawSize * btScalar(.9f), minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, btVector3(0,0,0));
01298                                         axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(1);
01299                                         btScalar ay = p6DOF->getAngle(1);
01300                                         btScalar az = p6DOF->getAngle(2);
01301                                         btScalar cy = btCos(ay);
01302                                         btScalar sy = btSin(ay);
01303                                         btScalar cz = btCos(az);
01304                                         btScalar sz = btSin(az);
01305                                         btVector3 ref;
01306                                         ref[0] = cy*cz*axis[0] + cy*sz*axis[1] - sy*axis[2];
01307                                         ref[1] = -sz*axis[0] + cz*axis[1];
01308                                         ref[2] = cz*sy*axis[0] + sz*sy*axis[1] + cy*axis[2];
01309                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB();
01310                                         btVector3 normal = -tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01311                                         btScalar minFi = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(0)->m_loLimit;
01312                                         btScalar maxFi = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(0)->m_hiLimit;
01313                                         if(minFi > maxFi)
01314                                         {
01315                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, ref, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, -SIMD_PI, SIMD_PI, btVector3(0,0,0), false);
01316                                         }
01317                                         else if(minFi < maxFi)
01318                                         {
01319                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, ref, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, minFi, maxFi, btVector3(0,0,0), true);
01320                                         }
01321                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01322                                         btVector3 bbMin = p6DOF->getTranslationalLimitMotor()->m_lowerLimit;
01323                                         btVector3 bbMax = p6DOF->getTranslationalLimitMotor()->m_upperLimit;
01324                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawBox(bbMin, bbMax, tr, btVector3(0,0,0));
01325                                 }
01326                         }
01327                         break;
01329                 case D6_SPRING_2_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01330                 {
01331                         {
01332                                 btGeneric6DofSpring2Constraint* p6DOF = (btGeneric6DofSpring2Constraint*)constraint;
01333                                 btTransform tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01334                                 if (drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01335                                 tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB();
01336                                 if (drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01337                                 if (drawLimits)
01338                                 {
01339                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01340                                         const btVector3& center = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB().getOrigin();
01341                                         btVector3 up = tr.getBasis().getColumn(2);
01342                                         btVector3 axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01343                                         btScalar minTh = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(1)->m_loLimit;
01344                                         btScalar maxTh = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(1)->m_hiLimit;
01345                                         btScalar minPs = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(2)->m_loLimit;
01346                                         btScalar maxPs = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(2)->m_hiLimit;
01347                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawSpherePatch(center, up, axis, dbgDrawSize * btScalar(.9f), minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, btVector3(0, 0, 0));
01348                                         axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(1);
01349                                         btScalar ay = p6DOF->getAngle(1);
01350                                         btScalar az = p6DOF->getAngle(2);
01351                                         btScalar cy = btCos(ay);
01352                                         btScalar sy = btSin(ay);
01353                                         btScalar cz = btCos(az);
01354                                         btScalar sz = btSin(az);
01355                                         btVector3 ref;
01356                                         ref[0] = cy*cz*axis[0] + cy*sz*axis[1] - sy*axis[2];
01357                                         ref[1] = -sz*axis[0] + cz*axis[1];
01358                                         ref[2] = cz*sy*axis[0] + sz*sy*axis[1] + cy*axis[2];
01359                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformB();
01360                                         btVector3 normal = -tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01361                                         btScalar minFi = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(0)->m_loLimit;
01362                                         btScalar maxFi = p6DOF->getRotationalLimitMotor(0)->m_hiLimit;
01363                                         if (minFi > maxFi)
01364                                         {
01365                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, ref, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, -SIMD_PI, SIMD_PI, btVector3(0, 0, 0), false);
01366                                         }
01367                                         else if (minFi < maxFi)
01368                                         {
01369                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, ref, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, minFi, maxFi, btVector3(0, 0, 0), true);
01370                                         }
01371                                         tr = p6DOF->getCalculatedTransformA();
01372                                         btVector3 bbMin = p6DOF->getTranslationalLimitMotor()->m_lowerLimit;
01373                                         btVector3 bbMax = p6DOF->getTranslationalLimitMotor()->m_upperLimit;
01374                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawBox(bbMin, bbMax, tr, btVector3(0, 0, 0));
01375                                 }
01376                         }
01377                         break;
01378                 }
01379                 case SLIDER_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
01380                         {
01381                                 btSliderConstraint* pSlider = (btSliderConstraint*)constraint;
01382                                 btTransform tr = pSlider->getCalculatedTransformA();
01383                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01384                                 tr = pSlider->getCalculatedTransformB();
01385                                 if(drawFrames) getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, dbgDrawSize);
01386                                 if(drawLimits)
01387                                 {
01388                                         btTransform tr = pSlider->getUseLinearReferenceFrameA() ? pSlider->getCalculatedTransformA() : pSlider->getCalculatedTransformB();
01389                                         btVector3 li_min = tr * btVector3(pSlider->getLowerLinLimit(), 0.f, 0.f);
01390                                         btVector3 li_max = tr * btVector3(pSlider->getUpperLinLimit(), 0.f, 0.f);
01391                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(li_min, li_max, btVector3(0, 0, 0));
01392                                         btVector3 normal = tr.getBasis().getColumn(0);
01393                                         btVector3 axis = tr.getBasis().getColumn(1);
01394                                         btScalar a_min = pSlider->getLowerAngLimit();
01395                                         btScalar a_max = pSlider->getUpperAngLimit();
01396                                         const btVector3& center = pSlider->getCalculatedTransformB().getOrigin();
01397                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawArc(center, normal, axis, dbgDrawSize, dbgDrawSize, a_min, a_max, btVector3(0,0,0), true);
01398                                 }
01399                         }
01400                         break;
01401                 default :
01402                         break;
01403         }
01404         return;
01405 }

01411 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::setConstraintSolver(btConstraintSolver* solver)
01412 {
01413         if (m_ownsConstraintSolver)
01414         {
01415                 btAlignedFree( m_constraintSolver);
01416         }
01417         m_ownsConstraintSolver = false;
01418         m_constraintSolver = solver;
01419         m_solverIslandCallback->m_solver = solver;
01420 }
01421 
01422 btConstraintSolver* btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::getConstraintSolver()
01423 {
01424         return m_constraintSolver;
01425 }

01441 
01442 
01443 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::serializeRigidBodies(btSerializer* serializer)
01444 {
01445         int i;
01446         //serialize all collision objects
01447         for (i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
01448         {
01449                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
01450                 if (colObj->getInternalType() & btCollisionObject::CO_RIGID_BODY)
01451                 {
01452                         int len = colObj->calculateSerializeBufferSize();
01453                         btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(len,1);
01454                         const char* structType = colObj->serialize(chunk->m_oldPtr, serializer);
01455                         serializer->finalizeChunk(chunk,structType,BT_RIGIDBODY_CODE,colObj);
01456                 }
01457         }
01458 
01459         for (i=0;i<m_constraints.size();i++)
01460         {
01461                 btTypedConstraint* constraint = m_constraints[i];
01462                 int size = constraint->calculateSerializeBufferSize();
01463                 btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(size,1);
01464                 const char* structType = constraint->serialize(chunk->m_oldPtr,serializer);
01465                 serializer->finalizeChunk(chunk,structType,BT_CONSTRAINT_CODE,constraint);
01466         }
01467 }

01471 
01472 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::serializeDynamicsWorldInfo(btSerializer* serializer)
01473 {
01474 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01475                 int len = sizeof(btDynamicsWorldDoubleData);
01476                 btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(len,1);
01477                 btDynamicsWorldDoubleData* worldInfo = (btDynamicsWorldDoubleData*)chunk->m_oldPtr;
01478 #else//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01479                 int len = sizeof(btDynamicsWorldFloatData);
01480                 btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(len,1);
01481                 btDynamicsWorldFloatData* worldInfo = (btDynamicsWorldFloatData*)chunk->m_oldPtr;
01482 #endif//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01483 
01484                 memset(worldInfo ,0x00,len);
01485 
01486                 m_gravity.serialize(worldInfo->m_gravity);
01487                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_tau = getSolverInfo().m_tau;
01488                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_damping = getSolverInfo().m_damping;
01489                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_friction = getSolverInfo().m_friction;
01490                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_timeStep = getSolverInfo().m_timeStep;
01491 
01492                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_restitution = getSolverInfo().m_restitution;
01493                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_maxErrorReduction = getSolverInfo().m_maxErrorReduction;
01494                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_sor = getSolverInfo().m_sor;
01495                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_erp = getSolverInfo().m_erp;
01496 
01497                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_erp2 = getSolverInfo().m_erp2;
01498                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_globalCfm = getSolverInfo().m_globalCfm;
01499                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold = getSolverInfo().m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold;
01500                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_splitImpulseTurnErp = getSolverInfo().m_splitImpulseTurnErp;
01501 
01502                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_linearSlop = getSolverInfo().m_linearSlop;
01503                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_warmstartingFactor = getSolverInfo().m_warmstartingFactor;
01504                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_maxGyroscopicForce = getSolverInfo().m_maxGyroscopicForce;
01505                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold = getSolverInfo().m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold;
01506 
01507                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_numIterations = getSolverInfo().m_numIterations;
01508                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_solverMode = getSolverInfo().m_solverMode;
01509                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold = getSolverInfo().m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold;
01510                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_minimumSolverBatchSize = getSolverInfo().m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
01511 
01512                 worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_splitImpulse = getSolverInfo().m_splitImpulse;
01513 
01514                 // Fill padding with zeros to appease msan.
01515                 memset(worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_padding, 0, sizeof(worldInfo->m_solverInfo.m_padding));
01516 
01517 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01518                 const char* structType = "btDynamicsWorldDoubleData";
01519 #else//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01520                 const char* structType = "btDynamicsWorldFloatData";
01521 #endif//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01522                 serializer->finalizeChunk(chunk,structType,BT_DYNAMICSWORLD_CODE,worldInfo);
01523 }
01524 
01525 void    btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::serialize(btSerializer* serializer)
01526 {
01527 
01528         serializer->startSerialization();
01529 
01530         serializeDynamicsWorldInfo(serializer);
01531 
01532         serializeCollisionObjects(serializer);
01533 
01534         serializeRigidBodies(serializer);
01535 
01536         serializer->finishSerialization();
01537 }
